title: ‘I have nothing to hide’: Trump responds to Epstein link claims; takes dig at Hillary Clinton
summary_full: President Trump reiterated his denial of any involvement with Jeffrey Epstein, stating he has been "totally exonerated" and has "nothing to hide." He claimed investigations cleared him and suggested Epstein opposed his election. Released files reference past contact and Trump's comments to investigators, though officials found no credible information warranting further investigation into him.
